"Darkness From the Chaos":
"Mechs, Dragonkin and Kuronites have
been confirmed in the Forest area of
planet Naberius.
The number of Darkers there is
increasing, as is their level of activity.
We have also detected a Dark Falz-class
reading in the area.
All ARKS, dispatch and investigate.
―――――――――――――――――――
Collect [2016] Quest Points to clear."
"We've been receiving reports of enemies appearing that shouldn't ever be in this area."
"We've also detected high levels of Darker activity, as well as a strong enemy reading. We cannot predict what you'll encounter here."

"Given how little we've been able to confirm, we have no idea what kinds of danger could be lurking ahead...
Please, take care of yourselves."
